summary: Gintoki travels into the future and discovers it to be a wasteland with his friends fallen apart. He reunites them to find out what went wrong and how to fix things.
cast: Tomokazu Sugita|Daisuke Sakaguchi|Rie Kugimiya|Tsutomu Isobe|Kôichi Yamadera|Satsuki Yukino|Yû Kobayashi|Yûko Kaida|Fumiko Orikasa|Mikako Takahashi|Akira Ishida|Susumu Chiba|Kazuya Nakai|Kenichi Suzumura|Tetsuharu Ôta|Kôji Yusa|Takehito Koyasu|Shin'ichirô Miki|Bin Shimada|Kujira|Omi Minami|Fumihiko Tachiki|Yu Sugimoto|Eiichiro Tokumoto|Ryô Kuratomi|Mammoth Nishio|Hirokazu Miura|Hiroki Gotô|Hironori Kondo|Akira Kamiya
title: Gekijouban Gintama Kanketsu-hen: Yorozuyayo eien nare
